programme.title: Carlota: Proving herself and her sport to the world | The Starting Line
programme.desc: A young female breaker for France, Carlota Dudek is training to qualify for the Olympics to showcase her unique style to the world, inherited from her mother Cuban origin. We travel with her from Paris to her hometown in the heart of Provence where her life-long dance journey began.

programme.title: ESP v ARG - Men's Preliminaries - Basketball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This Preliminary Round Game took place on 29/07/2021 at the Saitama Super Arena, Saitama. Final score ESP 81:71 ARG.

programme.title: Trap Finals - Shooting | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 29/07/2021 at the Asaka Shooting Range, Tokyo. Rehak Stefecekova (SVK) claimed the Gold in the Women's Trap and Liptak (CZE) in the Men's Trap competiton.

programme.title: Teresa Portela Olympic longevity makes her a legend | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Marked by determination, Teresa Portela's journey unfolds over six Olympics. From Rio to Tokyo, Portela's pursuit of Olympic glory was balanced between being an elite athlete and the joys of motherhood. In Tokyo, she finally won a long-awaited medal by bringing home silver in the K-1 200 canoe sprint event. Now training for Paris 2024, she will become the first Spanish women to compete in seven Olympic Games.

programme.title: Iris Tió is key to Spain’s next gold in Artistic Swimming | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Iris Tió Casas joined the senior national team at 15, living away from her parents most of the time. Four years later she competed in Tokyo where she was the youngest on the team. For Paris 2024, she will be crucial to the team’s chances, aiming for gold at Paris 2024. Her journey reflects immense dedication, resilience, and a dream realized through hard work. She will compete in the team as well as in the duet event with her partner Alissa Ozhogina.

programme.title: Helen Glover eyes Paris 2024 for her fourth Olympics | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: After winning back-to-back gold in London 2012 and Rio 2016, Helen Glover made a remarkable come-back in Tokyo 2020, being the first mother to row for Britain. She and partner Polly Swann finished fourth. Helen now has her sights on Paris 2024 where she should be competing in the Women's four event, focusing on adding another Olympic medal to her impressive career for Team GB.

programme.title: France's Sevens captain targets gold at Paris 2024 | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Backed by a great team and high perfornming coaches, Carla's quest for Olympic gold symbolizes the rise of women's rugby since Rio 2016. From competing with boys to leading her nation to Silver in Tokyo 2020, the French rugby Seven squad’s captain inspires resilience and dedication on the road to Paris 2024.

programme.title: Niklas Kaul - medal contender for Paris 2024 | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Despite an incredible 2019 season, winning gold at the World Championships and setting a world’s best record, decathlete Niklas Kaul from Germany faced challenges at Tokyo 2020 due to an injury sustained in the high jump event. After focusing on recovery and preparing for future competitions, he reached an impressive 4th place at the European Championships in Roma, which puts him back in a position to medal at Paris 2024.

programme.title: Leonardo Fabbri’s success is rooted in family support | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: From his early athletic beginnings to his emotional 22.34m throw, Leonardo's journey is marked by family support and a dream of Olympic success. Despite setbacks, his determination remains unshaken as he aims for glory at Paris 2024. The Tuscan shot putter won gold at the European Championships, setting a championship record and placing him as a serious contender for the coming games.

programme.title: Matteo Zurloni Italy’s world champion climbs to the top | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Dive into the remarkable journey of Matteo Zurloni, from small town dreamer to Olympic contender. He won the speed event at the 2023 IFSC Climbing World Championships and earning a shot at Olympic glory. Follow his ascent from humble beginnings to the dizzying heights of international competition, where every climb is a test of skill, courage, and the relentless pursuit of excellence.

programme.title: Norwegian duo are targeting back-to-back Olympic Gold | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Reigning World and Olympic Champions Christian Sørum and Anders Mol are dominating beach volleyball. Their partnership, rooted in a Viking mentality, has kept them atop the sport for six years. They are now preparing for a historic back-to-back Olympic gold at Paris 2024 to honour Christian's mother's legacy.

programme.title: Teahupo'o Surf Camp | Road to Paris 2024
programme.desc: Experience the thrills and spills as seven surfers join an ISA surf camp at Teahupo'o, Tahiti's famed surf spot and the surfing venue for the Olympic Games Paris 2024. Determined to conquer the Olympic wave, they face their fears, push the boundaries and challenge the raw power of nature.

programme.title: GBR v AUS - Women's Quarter-Final - Football | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This match took place on 30/07/2021 at the Ibaraki Kashima Stadium, Kashima. Final Score GBR 3:4 AUS (AET).

programme.title: Women's Individual QFs/SFs/Finals - Archery | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at Yumenoshima Park Archery Field, Tokyo. An San (KOR) won Gold, Elena Osipova (ROC) took Silver and Lucilla Boari (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 6 - Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre,Tokyo. It includes the Men's 200m Backstroke, the Women's 100m Freestyle, Women's 200m Breaststroke, the Men's 200m Individual Medley Finals and their Victory Ceremonies as well as the Men's 100m Butterfly and Women's 200m Backstroke Semifinals. Schoenmaker (RSA) claimed Gold in the Women's 200m Breaststroke, Rylov (ROC) in the Men's 200m Backstroke, McKeon (AUS) in the Women's 100m Freestyle and Wang (CHN) in the Men's 200m Individual Medley.

programme.title: Eventing Dressage Team & Individual - Session 2 - Equestrian | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Equestrian Park, Tokyo.

programme.title: Men's Laser & 49er, Women's 49er FX - Sailing | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 in and around the Enoshima Yacht Harbour, Fujisawa.

programme.title: GBR v AUS - Women's Quarter-Final - Football | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This match took place on 30/07/2021 at the Ibaraki Kashima Stadium, Kashima. Final Score GBR 3:4 AUS (AET).

programme.title: Women's 3m Springboard Preliminary - Diving | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 30/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo.

programme.title: Victory for Us | The Untold Story of India’s First Surf Team
programme.desc: El Salvador, World Surfing Games 2023, the Indian Surf Team participates for the very first time in an international event chasing their Olympic Qualification. This is the story of that journey, where those kids that once started surfing with broken boards reach an international stage for the first time, where they meet their surfing idols and earn experience for upcoming competitions. Watch it now!

programme.title: GRE v SRB - Men's Gold Medal Match - Water Polo | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match was played on 08/08/2021 at the Tatsumi Water Polo Centre, Tatsumi. Serbia claimed Gold with a 13:10 victory over Greece

programme.title: Nikoloz: The judo World Champion from two nations | The Starting Line
programme.desc: When Nikoloz Sherazadishvili’s family moved him from Georgia to Spain at a young age, his father instilled a love of judo in him. He quickly felt at home at the local club of Brunete, in the outskirt of Madrid, where everything started with his first coach Quino Ruiz. As he gears up for his second Olympics, surrounded by his family and friends, he’s competing on the mat for Spain but also holding Georgia and the memory of his father close to his heart.

programme.title: Men's Individual QFs/SFs/Finals - Archery | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 31/07/2021 at Yumenoshima Park Archery Field, Tokyo. Mete Gazoz (TUR) claimed Gold, Mauro Nespoli (ITA) took Silver and Takaharu Furukawa (JPN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Weightlifting 85kg | Sydney 2000 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Pyrros Dimas wins the Gold for Greece, Marc Huster the Silver for Germany and Georg Asanidze the Bronze for Georgia in the men's weightlifting 85kg at the Sydney Summer Olympic Games in 2000

programme.title: Men's 100m Final | Beijing 2008 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Relive the greatest Olympic Moments and watch Usain Bolt's men's 100m final from Beijing 2008, as well as other best moments from his career. See more Usain Bolt videos below.

programme.title: Women's Shot Put Final | Rio 2016 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Michelle Carter wins the Gold for the USA, Valerie Adams the Silver for New Zealand and Anita Marton the Bronze for Hungary in the women's shot put final at the Rio Summer Olympic Games in 2016

programme.title: Mount Kenya University Field Hockey Team
programme.desc: Team Netherlands Olympic hero Jacques Brinkman travels to Kenya to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling field hockey team.

programme.title: IRI v FRA - Men's Preliminaries - Basketball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This Preliminary Round Game took place on 31/07/2021 at the Saitama Super Arena, Saitama. Final score IRI 62:79 FRA

programme.title: Women's Sabre Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts - Fencing | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 31/07/2021 at the Makuhari Messe Hall B, Chiba. It includes the Women's Sabre Team Finals and the Victory Ceremony. ROC claimed the Gold, FRA Silver and KOR completed the podium

programme.title: Women's 3m Springboard Semi-Final - Diving | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 31/07/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. Tingmao SHI (CHN) was leading the fields into the final

programme.title: Men's Singles QFs & Women's Doubles SFs - Badminton | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 31/07/2021 at the Musashino Forest Sport Plaza, Tokyo. It includes Men's Singles Quarterfinals and the Women's Doubles Semifinal Matches.
